hero.title: Remove watermarks from your images.
hero.subtitle: Remove watermarks from your images with our AI-powered tool.

showcase.title: Check out the results
showcase.subtitle: We have results like no other.

primaryFeatures.title: Everything you need to run your books.
primaryFeatures.subtitle: Well everything you need if you aren't that picky about minor details like tax compliance.

features.title: Payroll
features.description: Keep track of everyone's salaries and whether or not they've been paid. Direct deposit not supported.

features.title: Claim expenses
features.description: All of your receipts organized into one place, as long as you don't mind typing in the data by hand.

features.title: VAT handling
features.description: We only sell our software to companies who don't deal with VAT at all, so technically we do all the VAT stuff they need.

features.title: Reporting
features.description: Easily export your data into an Excel spreadsheet where you can do whatever the hell you want with it.

secondaryFeatures.title: Simplify everyday business tasks.
secondaryFeatures.subtitle: Because you'd probably be a little confused if we suggested you complicate your everyday business tasks instead.

features.name: Reporting
features.summary: Stay on top of things with always up-to-date reporting features.
features.description: We talked about reporting in the section above but we needed three items here, so mentioning it one more time for posterity.

features.name: Inventory
features.summary: Never lose track of what's in stock with accurate inventory tracking.
features.description: We don't offer this as part of our software but that statement is inarguably true. Accurate inventory tracking would help you for sure.

features.name: Contacts
features.summary: Organize all of your contacts, service providers, and invoices in one place.
features.description: This also isn't actually a feature, it's just some friendly advice. We definitely recommend that you do this, you'll feel really organized and professional.

callToAction.title: Get started today
callToAction.subtitle: It's time to take control of your books. Buy our software so you can feel like you're doing something productive.

testimonials.title: Loved by businesses worldwide.
testimonials.subtitle: Our software is so simple that people can't help but fall in love with it. Simplicity is easy when you just skip tons of mission-critical features.

testimonials.content: TaxPal is so easy to use I can't help but wonder if it's really doing the things the government expects me to do.
I'm trying to get a hold of someone in support, I'm in a lot of trouble right now and they are saying it has something to do with my books. Please get back to me right away.

The best part about TaxPal is every time I pay my employees, my bank balance doesn't go down like it used to. Looking forward to spending this extra cash when I figure out why my card is being declined.
There are so many things I had to do with my old software that I just don't do at all with TaxPal. Suspicious but I can't say I don't love it.
I used to have to remit tax to the EU and with TaxPal I somehow don't have to do that anymore. Nervous to travel there now though.
This is the fourth email I've sent to your support team. I am literally being held in jail for tax fraud. Please answer your damn emails, this is important.

pricing.title: Simple pricing, for everyone.
pricing.subtitle: It doesn't matter what size your business is, our software won't work well for you.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Good for anyone who is self-employed and just getting started.
features: Track up to 15 expenses per month

smallBusiness.name: Small business
smallBusiness.description: Perfect for small / medium sized businesses.
features: Track up to 50 expenses per month

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For even the biggest enterprise companies.
features: Track up to 200 expenses per month
Export up to 25 reports, including TPS

faqs.title: Frequently asked questions
faqs.subtitle: If you can't find what you're looking for, email our support team and if you're lucky someone will get back to you.

questions.question: Does TaxPal handle VAT?
questions.answer: Well no, but if you move your company offshore you can probably ignore it.

questions.question: Can I pay for my subscription via purchase order?
questions.answer: Absolutely, we are happy to take your money in all forms.

questions.question: How do I apply for a job at TaxPal?
questions.answer: We only hire our customers, so subscribe for a minimum of 6 months and then let's talk.

questions.question: What was that testimonial about tax fraud all about?
questions.answer: TaxPal is just a software application, ultimately your books are your responsibility.

questions.question: TaxPal sounds horrible but why do I still feel compelled to purchase?
questions.answer: This is the power of excellent visual design. You just can't resist it, no matter how poorly it actually functions.

questions.question: I found other companies called TaxPal, are you sure you can use this name?
questions.answer: Honestly not sure at all. We haven't actually incorporated or anything, we just thought it sounded cool and made this website.

questions.question: How do you generate reports?
questions.answer: You just tell us what data you need a report for, and we get our kids to create beautiful charts for you using only the finest crayons.

questions.question: Can we expect more inventory features?
questions.answer: In life it's really better to never expect anything at all.

questions.question: I lost my password, how do I get into my account?
questions.answer: Send us an email and we will send you a copy of our latest password spreadsheet so you can find your information.

login.title: Sign in to your account
login.subtitle: Don't have an account? Sign up for a free trial.

metadata.title: TaxPal - Accounting made simple for small businesses
metadata.description: Most bookkeeping software is accurate, but hard to use. We make the opposite trade-off, and hope you don't get audited.
